summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to condemnation proceedings to acquire land and other property at 32nd Avenue West and West Logan Street adjacent to Magnolia Park for park and recreation purposes pursuant to Ordinance 98499, King County Cause No. 755061; accepting the condemnation award therein, making an appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund therefor, and providing that the Sewer Fund shall be reimbursed from said award pursuant to the Judgment and a prior assignment of such funds by the property owners.
